title: In very rare cases, neither success or failure callback functions are called. This happens when you have internet connection problems or the APNS Sandbox is down. The system do an API call to APNS to do some verification, failing to do so will lead to none of the two callbacks functions will be called. Visit
Apple system status
a
https://developer.apple.com/system-status/
to make sure its fine.
